TransLasso 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    TransLasso

    Rcode for the TransLasso algorithm.

    Installation

    The development version can be installed from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Ulthran/TransLasso")

    Documentation

    See the GitHub Pages site for function documentation. The associated paper is entitled Transfer Learning for High-dimensional Linear Regression by Sai Li, T. Tony Cai, & Hongzhe Li.
